<description type="note">Preliminaries and introductory material omitted<lb/>The following plays have been taken from this source:</description>

Genre: English mystery and miracle plays.
<description type="note">Square brackets represent sections of text unclear in the original and supplied by the current editor.</description>

Ysaias I am Ã¾e prophete callyd Isaye Replett with godys grett influens and sey pleynly be spyryte of prophecie Ã¾at a clene mayde thourgh meke obedyens Shall bere a childe which xal do resystens Ageyn foule Zabulon Ã¾e devyl of helle mannys soule ageyn hym to defens Opyn in Ã¾e felde Ã¾e fend he xal felle. Where fore I seye quod virgo concipiet et pariet filium nomen emanuel Oure lyf for to saue he xal suffyr deth and bye us to his blysse in hevyn for to dwell Of Sacerdotale lynage Ã¾e trewth I ?ow tell Fflesch and blood to take god wyll be born Joye to man in erth and in hevyn Aungell At Ã¾e chyldys byrth joye xal make Ã¾at morn. Radix Jesse Egredietur virga de radice jesse Et flos de radice eius ascendet A blyssyd braunch xal sprynge of me That xal be swettere Ã¾an bawmys breth Out of Ã¾at braunch in nazareth A flowre xal blome of me jesse rote The which by grace xal dystroye deth and brynge mankende to blysse most sote. Dauyd Rex I am david of jesse rote the fresch kyng by naturall successyon and of my blood xal sprynge oure bote As god hym self hath mad promyssyon Of Regall lyff xal come suche foyson Ã¾at a clene mayde modyr xal be Ageyns Ã¾e devellys fals illusyon with regall power to make man fre. Jeremias propheta I am Ã¾e prophete Jeremye And fullich a-corde in all sentence with kyng dauid and with ysaie Affermynge pleynly be-forn Ã¾is Audyens That god of his high benyvolens of prest and kynge wyll take lynage And bye us all ffrom oure offens in hevyn to haue his herytage. Salamon rex I am Salamon Ã¾e secunde kynge And Ã¾at wurthy temple for sothe made I which Ã¾at is fygure of Ã¾at mayde ?ynge Ã¾at xal be modyr of grett messy. Ezechiel propheta A vysion of Ã¾is fful veryly I Ezechiel haue had also Of a gate Ã¾at sperd was trewly and no man but a prince myght Ã¾er-in go. Roboas rex The iijd e kynge of Ã¾e jentyll jesse my name is knowe kyng Roboas of oure kynrede ?itt men xul se A clene mayde trede down foule sathanas. Micheas propheta And I am a Prophete calde mycheas I telle ?ow pleynly Ã¾at Ã¾us it is Evyn lyke as Eve modyr of wo was So xal a maydyn be modyr of blyss. Abias Rex I that am calde kynge Abias conferme for trewe Ã¾at ?e han seyd and sey also as in Ã¾is cas Ã¾at all oure myrth comyth of a mayd. Danyel propheta I prophete Danyel am well apayed in fygure of Ã¾is I saw a tre all Ã¾e fendys of hell xall ben affrayd whan maydenys ffrute Ã¾er on Ã¾ei se. Asa Rex I kynge Asa be-leve all Ã¾is Ã¾at god wyll of a maydyn be born And vs to bryngyn to endles blys Ruly on rode be rent and torn. Jonas propheta I jonas sey Ã¾at on Ã¾e iijd e morn ffro deth he xal ryse Ã¾is is a trew tall fyguryd in me Ã¾e which longe beforn lay iij days beryed with in Ã¾e qwall. Josophat rex And I josophat Ã¾e vjt e kynge serteyn of jesse rote in Ã¾e lenyall successyon All Ã¾at my progenitouris hath be-for me seyn Ffeythfully be-leve with-owtyn all dubytacion. Abdias propheta I abdias prophete make Ã¾is protestacion Ã¾at aftyr he is resyn to lyve onys a-?en deth xal be drevyn to endles dampnacion And lyff xal be grawntyd of paradys ful pleyn. Joras Rex And I Joras also in Ã¾e numbre of sefne of jesse rote kynge knowlych Ã¾at he aftyr his resurreccion returne xal to hefne both god and verry man ther endles to be. Abacuch propheta I Abacuch prophete holde wele with the whan he is resyn he xal up stye in hevyn as juge sitt in his se Vs for to deme whan we xal dye. Ozias Rex And I Ozyas Kynge of hygh degre Spronge of jesse rote dar well sey this whan he is gon to his dygnyte he xal send Ã¾e sprytt to his discyplis. Joell propheta And I Joel knowe full trewe Ã¾at is god bad me wryte in prophesye he wolde sende down his sprytt i-wys On ?onge and olde ful sekyrlye. Joathas rex My name is knowe kyng Joathan the ixe kynge spronge of jesse Of my kynrede god wol be man mankend to saue and Ã¾at joyth me. Aggeus propheta With ?ow I do holde Ã¾at am prophete Aggee Com of Ã¾e same hygh and holy stok god of oure kynrede in dede born wyl be From Ã¾e wulf to saue al shepe of his flok. Achas rex Off jesse kyng Achas is my name Ã¾at falsly wurchepyd ydolatrye tyl Ysaie putt me in blame And seyd a mayd xulde bere messye. Ozyas propheta Off Ã¾at byrthe wyttnes bere I A prophete Osyas men me calle And aftyr Ã¾at tale of Isaye Ã¾at mayd xal bere Emanuelle. Ezechias rex My name is knowyn kyng Ezechyas Ã¾e xjt e kyng of Ã¾is geneologye And say ffor sothe as in Ã¾is cas A mayde be mekenes xal brynge mercye. Sophosas propheta I A prophete callyd Sophonye of Ã¾is matyr do bere wyttnes and for trowth to sertyfie Ã¾at maydens byrth oure welth xal dresse. Manasses rex Of Ã¾is nobyll and wurthy generacion the xije kyng am I manasses wyttnessynge here be trew testyficacion Ã¾at maydenys childe xal be prince of pes. Baruk propheta And I baruk prophete conferme wurdys thes lord and prince of pes Ã¾ow Ã¾at chylde be Al his fomen ageyn hym Ã¾at pres Ryght a grym syre at domys day xal he be. Amon Rex Amon kynge ffor Ã¾e last conclusyon Al thynge be-forn seyd ffor trowth do testyfie Praynge Ã¾at lord of oure synne Remyssyon At Ã¾at dredful day he us graunt mercye Thus we all of Ã¾is genealogye Acordynge in on here in Ã¾is place Pray Ã¾at hey? lorde whan Ã¾at we xal dye Of his gret goodnesse to grawnt us his grace. Explicit Jesse. Barpanter, Asmaria genuit Joachym Ysakar, Nasaphat gen. Anna Joachym, Anna gen. sponsa Joseph fabro Joachym, Anna gen. Maria mater ihesu Christi Cleophas et Anna gen. ija sponsa Alpheo Cleophas et Anna gen. ija Maria mater Symonem et Judam Jacobum minorem et Cleophas et Anna gen. ija Joseph just[um] Salome et Anna gen. iija sponsa Zebedeo. Salome et Anna gen. iija Maria mater Johannem euangelistam et Jacobum Salome et Anna gen. iija majorem. Emeria fuit soror Anne que habebat quondam filiam Elizabeth que nupta fui[t] Zakarie de quo peperit Johanne[m] baptistem precursorem domini Elyud. Emin? filia. beatus Geruasius episcopus
